resources.string: Sudoku is played on a 9x9 grid. This grid again consists of 3x3 squares.Each row, column and box needs to be filled out with the numbers 1â€“9 without repeating any numbers.

Use the buttons at the bottom of the game screen to select your active number. Press any empty square to fill it with your active number. If you press and hold a square it will be highlighted to help you remember any squares that you are unsure about.
